SELECT a.ad_id, a.title, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.bookmark_count, a.comment_count, a.created_at, a.updated_at,
b.user_id AS "user.user_id", c.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name"
FROM ad a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE a.ad_id = #{adId} AND status = 'ACTIVATE'

SELECT a.ad_id, a.title, a.view_count, a.like_count, a.bookmark_count, a.comment_count, a.created_at, a.updated_at,
b.user_id AS "user.user_id", c.category_id AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name"
FROM ad a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE a.ad_id = #{adId} AND status = 'ACTIVATE'
AND a.category_id = #{ id }
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ title }, '%')
ORDER BY a.ad_id DESC LIMIT #{ limit } OFFSET #{ offset }
